articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Jungle has attracted investments from prominent VC firms including Bitkraft Ventures, Framework Ventures, and Delphi Digital.
articles.title: Web3 Game Publisher Jungle Raises $6 Million for Mobile NFT Shooter

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Binance to spend its BUSD stablecoin on scooping up Bitcoin, Ethereum, and its native BNB token, the firm's CEO said.
articles.title: Binance Swaps BUSD Stablecoin From 'Recovery Fund' to Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Euler Finance suffered an exploit of at least $197 million. Reports indicate the attacker used flash loans to nab a variety of assets.
articles.title: DeFi Lender Euler Finance Drained of $197M In Flash Loan Exploit

articles.author: Kade Garrett
articles.description: Considered by some to be a currency without a state, the price of Bitcoin (BTC) has rapidly ascended and descended. What determines the current Bitcoin price?
articles.title: What Determines the Price of Bitcoin?

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The UK's Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt said that that SVB UK customers' deposits will be "protected, with no taxpayer support."
articles.title: HSBC UK Acquires Silicon Valley Bank's UK Branch for £1

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: While it may be ironic, crypto prices were buoyed by news of government intervention in a banking crisis.
articles.title: Crypto Market Rallies on FDIC Banking Intervention, USDC Regains Dollar Peg

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The disclosures came as the government affirmed that all deposits would be available come Monday morning.
articles.title: Coinbase, Paxos Disclose Exposure to Failed Signature Bank

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The Bitcoin miner’s hash rate represented around 0.002% of the network’s total computational power.
articles.title: 'Very Lucky' Solo Miner Solves Bitcoin Block for $148K Reward

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The statement assured spooked investors that the U.S. "banking system remains resilient" despite the failure of several institutions.
articles.title: Feds Shut Down Signature Bank, Say Signature and Silicon Valley Bank Depositors Will Be Made Whole

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: The drastic move would require the bank's failure to be attributed to "systemic risk."
articles.title: Feds Could Guarantee All Silicon Valley Bank Deposits: Report

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Silvergate and Silicon Valley Bank both went under this week. Stablecoin Circle slipped its peg in reaction to the news.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Crypto Has a Banking Crisis

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The federal government is instead focused on addressing the needs of SVB depositors.
articles.title: Silicon Valley Bank Bailout Ruled Out By Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Circle stated it would use corporate resources and "external capital if necessary" to ensure that USDC is redeemable for the US Dollar at a 1:1 ratio.
articles.title: Circle To ‘Stand Behind’ USDC, Cover $3.3 Billion Shortfall Held in Silicon Valley Bank

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: Circle says $3.3 billion of the cash reserves backing USDC remain at shuttered Silicon Valley Bank. USDC, DAI, and USDD have all depegged from $1.
articles.title: USDC Stablecoin Falls to 87 Cents After Circle Discloses Exposure to Silicon Valley Bank

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: By developing various on-chain products and services, Coinbase is hoping to get users onto its new Base roll-up and scoop up more revenue.
articles.title: Coinbase's Plan to Go 'On-Chain Native' Is a Smart Play for Fees

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: A market-wide selloff was well underway in the wake of the collapse of Silvergate Bank. Then Silicon Valley Bank imploded.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: After Silvergate and Silicon Valley Bank Collapse, Bitcoin and Ethereum Crash

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: After Circle disclosed how much of its USDC stablecoin is backed by reserves held by Silicon Valley Bank, exchanges show caution signs.
articles.title: Coinbase, Binance Suspend USDC Conversions as Dollar Peg Wobbles

articles.author: Sander Lutz,André Beganski
articles.description: BlockFi, Circle, Avalanche, Yuga Labs, and Proof are among the crypto names that had exposure to now-shuttered Silicon Valley Bank.
articles.title: Silicon Valley Bank Contagion: Crypto Companies Affected Include BlockFi, Circle, Avalanche, Ripple

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The effects of Silicon Valley Bank's failure are only beginning to be felt. Here's what's going on.
articles.title: As Silicon Valley Bank Falls, Crypto Firms Brace for 'Extinction-Level' Tech Startup Turmoil

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The privacy-centric browser is trying to boost crypto self-custody by providing an off-ramp within its integrated wallet.
articles.title: Brave Browser Now Lets Users Sell Crypto Within the Wallet

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The exchange has made changes to the way staked assets can be transferred and sold, emphasizing that customers earn rewards via protocols and not from Coinbase.
articles.title: Coinbase Updates Staking Service Following Regulatory Crackdown

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The company behind the massively popular Nintendo video game series could be exploring Web3 moves, based on a new job listing.
articles.title: Gotta Catch NFTs? The Pokémon Company Is Hiring a Web3 Expert

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The president’s ambitious tax plan has new rules for digital assets—how will it affect the ordinary trader?
articles.title: Biden’s Tax Hike Proposal and What It Means for Bitcoin 'Wash Sales'

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Silicon Valley Bank was closed by California's financial regulator and insured depositors can expect to withdraw their money by Monday.
articles.title: California Financial Regulator Shutters Silicon Valley Bank

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description: The Breakout NFT conference is a first-of-its-kind meeting of the minds for Web3 builders and leaders in Brazil.
articles.title: Breakout NFT Conference is Building Web3 Communities in São Paulo

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Trading for SVB Financial has been suspended as the parent company behind Silicon Valley Bank is reportedly seeking a buyout.
articles.title: Embattled Silicon Valley Bank Seeking Outside Acquisition: Report

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: On-chain analytics indicate that the now-bankrupt Voyager has been steadily selling various assets, including Ethereum and Shiba Inu.
articles.title: Voyager Liquidates $56M in Ethereum, SHIB, and Other ERC-20 Tokens

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bitcoin plunged below $20,000 for the first time since mid-January as multiple factors placed increased pressure on the crypto industry.
articles.title: Bitcoin Plummets 8% as Crypto Market Falls Below $1 Trillion

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Ordinal inscriptions hit a new daily peak Thursday after someone figured out how to mint a form of "fungible tokens" on Bitcoin.
articles.title: People Are Minting 'BRC-20' Meme Tokens on Bitcoin via Ordinals

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Rep. Tom Emmer says he has strong concerns that a CBDC could jeopardize American civil liberties.
articles.title: Congressman Warns Digital Dollar Could Expand 'Financial Control' Over Americans

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The startup behind EOS said that it exited its position in the soon-to-shutter "crypto-friendly" bank—at an apparently sizable loss.
articles.title: Peter Thiel-Backed Block.one Says it Sold Off Silvergate Stake

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The GQ3 NFT passes are now selling for about half the original price as the men’s lifestyle magazine says it will reward holders.
articles.title: GQ Magazine NFT Drop Flops—And the Floor Is Falling Fast

articles.author: Guillermo Jimenez,Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The New York AG seeks to block access to the crypto exchange in the state.
articles.title: New York Attorney General Sues KuCoin, Claims Ethereum Is a Security

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Things are looking grim for the U.S.-based, crypto-friendly banks.
articles.title: Signature Bank’s Stock Sinks 10% as Silvergate Prepares to Shut Down

articles.description: Voltz Labs Co-founder and CEO Simon Jones talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about using DeFi for interest rate swaps, the unfriendly regulatory environment in the US right now, emerging economies becoming crypto hubs, and the "cartoonishly large" market opportunity for DeFi.
articles.title: Voltz Labs CEO: DeFi Innovation Is Moving Offshore Because of US Regulatory Severity

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: After its free NFTs garnered significant value, the Polygon-based Starbucks Odyssey platform is dropping its first paid collectible.
articles.title: Starbucks Serves Up Its First Premium NFTs at $100 a Pop

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Solidus Labs says it has found more than 250,000 rug pulls since 2021—a new scam token created every 4 minutes.
articles.title: Token Sniffer Adds API for Faster Scam Scans

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Following a recent governance proposal, SushiSwap is rolling out a new rewards program in partnership with r/CryptoCurrency.
articles.title: Cryptocurrency Subreddit Launches New MOON Token Pool on SushiSwap

articles.description: MoonPay CEO Ivan Soto-Wright talked to Decrypt's Liam Kelly at NFT Paris about how NFTs are clearly not "waning," how MoonPay works with brands like Puma and Nike to manage their Web3 plays and smart contracts, and how NFTs and crypto will go mainstream when they can integrate in our daily lives—and his prediction that brands will drive that.
articles.title: MoonPay CEO: Next Phase of NFT Adoption Will Come From 'Brands You Love in Your Everyday Life'

articles.author: Greg Thomson
articles.description: The UK Financial Conduct Authority continues to target and disrupt illegal Bitcoin ATM businesses, this time it's taking aim at London.
articles.title: FCA, Met Police Continue Bitcoin ATM Crackdown in East London

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The theme restaurant chain is expanding its Web3 presence via a new members-only launch with Animoca Brands.
articles.title: Planet Hollywood, Animoca Brands to Launch NFT Club in L.A.

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bitcoin and major altcoins slipped further following the news of crypto-friendly bank Silvergate winding down operations.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Down 8% on the Week as Silvergate Bank Shuts Shop

articles.description: Brandon Potts, a principal at Web3 VC firm Framework Ventures, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about his investment focus, his outlook on crypto regulation right now, and why he's optimistic for the industry even amid the bear market and recent regulatory actions.
articles.title: Framework Ventures Is 'Optimistic That Regulators Are Much More Educated' About Crypto Than in Past

articles.description: Fanny Lakoubay, the founder of art advisory and agency LAL Art, talked to Decrypt's Liam Kelly at NFT Paris about what LAL Art does, how it works with artists, museums, directors, and galleries, and why artists in Web3 have to "reinvent themselves every six months."
articles.title: Why LAL Art Has 'No Interest In Just Putting the Traditional Art Market on the Blockchain'

articles.description: Anjali Young, the co-founder of Abridged and Collab.Land, talked to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about the origins of Collab.Land and says it erupted thanks to Covid, which created not just new interest in crypto but the need for better tools for DAO member collaboration.
articles.title: Collab.Land Grew 'Because of Covid' Creating Need for DAO Tools: Co-founder Anjali Young

articles.description: Visual artist Mat Collishaw, who uses mixed media to explore beauty, is about to launch Heterosis, a metaverse art experience with dynamic NFTs hosted by OG.Art. He spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about how he came to Web3.
articles.title: Artist Mat Collishaw is Exploring the 'Mutability' of NFTs

articles.description: Samir Addamine, Co-founder and CEO of Web3 CRM software company Absolute Labs, told Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris that big consumer brands are rushing to figure out crypto wallets and how they can harness them for their marketing purposes and to deepen ties with customers.
articles.title: Absolute Labs CEO: Big Brands Are Trying to Understand and Harness Crypto Wallets

articles.description: Pseudonymous NFT collector Gmoney talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about his Web3 luxury brand 9dcc, big brands getting into NFTs, the debate over creator royalty fees, and what will come next to the space.
articles.title: NFT Collector Gmoney: 'Marketplaces Have Nothing to Trade Without Creators'

articles.description: Dispatch is a new Web3 marketing, messaging, and ad tech tool from IEX, the exchange fighting high-frequency trading and made famous in the book "Flash Boys" by Michael Lewis. Dispatch head of product Sean Spector sat down with Decrypt's Liam Kelly at NFT Paris to talk about Dispatch's product vision and why Web2 companies are jumping into Web3.
articles.title: Head of Product for IEX's Dispatch: 'We See Tokens as the Social Graph of Web3'

articles.description: Neal Stephenson coined the term “metaverse” in his seminal 1992 sci-fi hit novel “Snow Crash.” Now he’s helming a metaverse blockchain company called Lamina1 and advocating for one free and open metaverse. He spoke to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves at length about what he got right and wrong in “Snow Crash,” goggles and flat screens, Big Tech, NFTs and digital ownership, and more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Neal Stephenson Maps Out the Metaverse

articles.description: Omer Amsel, head of Web3 products at crypto custody and settlement provider Fireblocks, told Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about why crypto market cycles are best for building, how Fireblocks is focused on providing "picks and shovels," and why the company still believes in the long-term promise of Web3.
articles.title: Fireblocks Is Laser-Focused on the Picks and Shovels: Web3 Products Lead at ETH Denver

articles.description: Mihai Crasneanu, Co-founder and CEO of Beem, describes Beem as "a mix of YouTube, Twitch, Zoom, and Clubhouse" that runs as a decentralized platform. He talked to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how it all works and how the platform is growing.
articles.title: CEO of Video Streaming Platform Beem: Decentralization Lets 'Creators Regain Their Autonomy'

articles.description: Miguel Faus funded his upcoming film "Calladita" via NFT sales and a prize grant from Decentralized Pictures and Steven Soderbergh. He told Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how the film process is progressing and how Web3 moves so quickly that the NFT funding model he used is already a thing of the past and other filmmakers need to find other ways to keep pushing the envelope.
articles.title: 'Calladita' Director Says NFT Funding Model He Used Is Already Gone Because Web3 Moves So Fast

articles.description: Coinbase protocols lead Jesse Pollak sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver 2023 to talk about the company's innovation strategy and its plans to keep "iterating quickly" on products like Coinbase NFT and its newly announced Layer-2 blockchain Base and its efforts to become an "on-chain-native company."
articles.title: Coinbase Protocols Lead Talks Plans for Base and NFT Marketplace

articles.description: Josie Bellini, NFT artist and creator of CyberBrokers, tells Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris how CyberBrokers creates "missions and quests" for its holders to complete that lead them to other hubs like Cryptovoxels, Mona, and other projects "so that we're not just in our own silo."
articles.title: How CyberBrokers Creates Quests Across Multiple NFT Communities: Josie Bellini

articles.description: Bolero co-founder and CEO William Bailey tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris how Bolero works, the vision behind letting fans of an artist own a piece of a song, the future for music NFTs, and how Web3 can change the music industry broadly.
articles.title: Web3 Music Platform Bolero Wants to 'Put a Record Label in Everyone's Pocket'

articles.description: French electronic music producer DJ Agoria told Decrypt's Dan Roberts what excites him most about music NFTs, how it informs his work as a generative artist, and why Web3 is all about artists exploring "new ideas that were not possible in Web2."
articles.title: 'We Don't Want to Make Music NFTs Mainstream': DJ Agoria

articles.description: Adidas Web3 lead Erika Wykes-Sneyd told Decrypt's Dan Roberts the story of what prompted Adidas to get into crypto (it involves Elon Musk), what the brand has done so far with NFTs tied to physical apparel, and what it's considering next—including token-gated sneaker drops.
articles.title: How Adidas Jumped Into Web3 and What It Plans Next

articles.description: Eva Assayag, Web3 lead at Panerai, sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about Panerai's Web3 strategy, which will soon include a "digital passport" sold with every watch.
articles.title: Why 160-Year-Old Luxury Watch Maker Panerai Is Getting into NFTs

articles.description: John Karp, president of NFT Factory Paris and the founder of Non-Fungible Conference Lisbon, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about the exploding Web3 community in Paris, the concept behind creating a physical gallery for NFTs, and how the existing art community understands NFTs because "everybody understands art."
articles.title: NFT Factory President: 'NFTs Will Be Active in a Bull or Bear Market'
